name: Bhutan's Bible
description:
Bhutan's Bible is designed specifically for Bhutan. Come and read the Christian Scriptures in Dzongkha and Nepali.
*Brand new AI assistant is designed to help you get the most out of your readings
*Dzongkha currently has Genesis, Exodus, Numbers, Deuteronomy, Ruth, Psalms, Proverbs, and Jonah. More Scriptures will be added as they are translated.
*Nepali includes the Nepali Contemporary Version in Devanagari script and transliterated into Latin script (English lettering) for Nepali speaking Bhutanese

Features
- Use the AI assistant to help you understand the passage, develop group study questions, even plan the outline of a talk
- Listen to the audio recording of Genesis, Ruth, and Jonah in Dzongkha while following along in the Scripture text.
- Highlight, bookmark, and take notes on passages
- Share passages with beautiful photos from around Bhutan
- Sync content across devices
- Watch introductory videos for passages to help you understand what you're reading (Nepali only)
